title: Pollution Index Map
desc: For this project, my team and I used React and Bootstrap to create a website that allows its users to monitor the pollution index across Indonesia. While the data is not real-time, it is relatively recent, typically ranging from a few months ago. We retrieve the data through the OpenWeather API, which requires longitude and latitude parameters to specify the geographic location. To facilitate this, we compiled a list of longitude and latitude coordinates for all the provinces in Indonesia. In this project I contributed in the navbar, footer, calculator, and other minor styling.

title: Pokemon Gallery
desc: This is a personal project that I created with React, in this project I learned a lot about how to use API as a data source, and I also learned how to paginate a data. The API that this project use is from PokeAPI.

title: QHealth Java Swing Project
desc: This project was developed using Java Swing and was worked on by me and my friends for our Object-Oriented Programming assignment. The application allows users to calculate their Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) by inputting their weight, height, and age. It then provides the user with their BMR, calorie needs, and food recommendations based on their calorie requirements. My contribution to this project is the development of the Java Swing Application it self.

title: RAAMEN Application
desc: This project, developed by my friends and me for our Pattern Software Design course, was implemented using ASP.NET. While the project prioritized functionality over user interface design, as it wasn't assessed by the instructor, it offers a comprehensive management system for a fictive restaurant named RAAMEN. The system serves both customers and administrators, allowing users to conveniently place orders and browse the available ramen options. Administrators have access to vital features such as generating reports, tracking all RAAMEN transactions, and managing ramen-related actions. My contribution to this project is most of the application development.

title: KATEKIMA Project
desc: This project is based on Laravel Framework and was worked on by me and my friends as part of our Software Engineering assignment, this project is an inventory management system for a stationery store. My contribution to this project is the backend side of the project (about 50%) and a little of front end.

title: Personal Website
desc: This personal website was made by me using Tailwind CSS and React. It showcases my portfolio as interactive cards that can be clicked to display more detailed information about each project. This website already implements responsive design.
